title: Best of The Herd: 07/06/2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/06/2020
description:
Colin says that Washington's football team will probably change their name. Colin explains why people need to accept that the media is in love with Cam Newton because he has "style". Colin says that Bryson DeChambeau is an interesting guy who is stealing the spotlight. Plus, Colin breaks down where he was right and wrong.

Guest: Author/Filmmaker Gotham Chopra

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
